import { useContext, useState } from "react"; import React, { ChangeEvent } from "react"; import { CategoryInterface } from "../Interfaces/CategoryInterface"; import CarTypeContext from "../CarTypes/CarTypeContext"; const SellType: React.FC = () => { const { chosenCategories, setChosenCategories }: CategoryInterface = useContext(CarTypeContext); const [droppedSellType, setDroppedSellType] = useState(false); const [chosenSellTypes, setChosenSellTypes] = useState([]); const handleChangeSellType = (event: ChangeEvent): void => { const checkboxValue = event.target.value; if (event.target.checked) { setChosenSellTypes([...chosenSellTypes, checkboxValue]); } else { const updatedSellTypes = chosenSellTypes.filter( (val: string) => val !== checkboxValue ); setChosenSellTypes(updatedSellTypes); } }; const showDropdownSellType = (): void => { setDroppedSellType(true); }; const handleBlurSellType = (): void => { setDroppedSellType(false); }; const handleCheckboxMouseDown = ( event: React.MouseEvent ): void => { event.preventDefault(); }; const resetVal = (): void => { setChosenSellTypes([]); }; return (

); }; export default SellType;
